CreateNodePool.title: 创建 TKE 节点池

DeleteNodePool.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tke.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeleteNodePool
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ClusterId": "xx",
    "NodePoolId": "xx"
}
DeleteNodePool.title: 删除 TKE 节点池
